d.f: ￹￺to keep * take care of￻謹慎，節制自愛

e: ￹`ma~`'imer~ `to~ `tireng~￺have good morals and high standards￻有好及高的道德水準，潔身自愛
￹`ma~`'imer~ `to~ `sowal~￺keep commandments￻謹慎說話，講話小心謹慎，堅守誡命
￹`Misa~`'imer~ `ko~ `Farisay~ `a~ `tamdaw~ `to~ `demak~ `ni~`~ `Yis~.￺The Pharisees watched (to find something wrong with) what Jesus did.￻法利賽人注目耶穌的行動
